metadata.name: stripe #47
metadata.description:
This collection is inspired by my experimental short film the immortality of the crab, shot on super 8 film and made with in-camera editing and no post-production. 
the immortality of the crab was included in the Straight 8 - 2019 London Selection and was screened at the Regent Street Cinema as well as several film festivals, including the 58th Ann Arbor Film Festival. 

I took a high-quality picture of each artwork, created with acrylics and cutting tools, and transformed them into a collection of visual music abstract art. 
Each frame is an artistic interpretation of the soundtrack, which was composed using only sounds sampled from cardboard.

Each NFT in this collection comprises high-quality images of one of the 68 cardboard strips made for the film, paired with the original soundtrack that I used to generate the abstract artwork on each frame.

Artworks & Animation: Giacomo Manzotti 
Sound Design: SonicMeal
